__e: So... I mapped out what I anticipate you'll experience over the next few minutes.
I've made a note of everything we've eaten, drunk and done. All the body toning, yoga, tanning, riding, everything.
I listed all the things we say we're gonna do on weekends... but when it comes around... you say they're too boring to actually do on a weekend day.
This was the last thing your grandmother wrote down before she died.
You are who you are, whether or not anybody's made note of it.
That had to be why she was writing everything down.
